message: I'm really surprised to se that there are only a few junk conversations on convore. Also the topics are quite well organized into their respective categories. Do you have means for ensuring this such as anti spam or is itbecause the users are not that numerous today ?

@aminho we're currently working on improving our admin tools so that admins themselves can manage and moderate content. Right now there aren't many spammers, but as the site gets bigger we'll have to build spam prevention tools as well
